Why Performance in Programming Is Always a Problem - Lucian Radu Teodorescu - ACCU 2025 Short Talks
---

Performance is always a problem - even when it’s not. In this ACCU 2025 lightning talk, Lucian Radu Teodorescu challenges our assumptions around software performance and code optimization. Through humor, thought experiments, and algorithmic insight, he explores why we obsess over performance in programming—and what happens when we pretend it doesn't matter.

Do you reach for quicksort because it's faster? Would you ever seriously consider bubble sort or even “bogus sort”? What if performance truly wasn’t a concern—what kind of systems would we build? Lucian dives into these questions with a satirical yet thought-provoking lens, proposing a universal algorithm that guarantees correctness… given infinite time and zero performance constraints.
